name: Depression Support Group
description: A weekly online support group for those living with depression to connect, share experiences, coping tools, and community building resources. This group meets every Friday: 2:00-3:30PM.
fullDescription: A weekly online support group for those living with depression to connect, share experiences, coping tools, and community building resources. This group meets every Friday: 2:00-3:30PM.
whatTheyOffer: A weekly online support group for those living with depression to connect, share experiences, coping tools, and community building resources. This group meets every Friday: 2:00-3:30PM.
howToGetIt: To receive the Zoom Meeting ID and password, send email to peersupportservices@mentalhealthsf.org Complete the Participant Information Form: https://mentalhealthsf.formstack.com/forms/participant_information_form and review the Client Rights and Requirement document: https://www.mentalhealthsf.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Client-Rights-Requirements.pdf
address: 870 Market Street, Suite 658, San Francisco, CA, 94102
agency: Mental Health Association of San Francisco (MHASF)
